MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH23 postcode area of Peebles and Gorebridge. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.34pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our overhead line network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.35pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
